item.title: Using AI for Scalability Analysis
item.description:
Actual output from Claude Sonnet 4.5 today:

Scalability Analysis

  • 10,000 entries over 5 years: ~200 entries/year = ~17 entries/month

You would think that computers, being literal computers, would be better at math…
